title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element is not displaying the content of the database field correctly.
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field that contains three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text element is not rendering the content correctly.
EB: The dynamic text element should render the content of the database field properly, displaying all three types of content as expected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Set up a database field with the three types of content mentioned above.
2. Create a dynamic text element on a page and configure it to display the content of this field.
3. Preview the page or deploy it.
4. Check if the dynamic text element correctly renders all three types of content from the database field.
